title: YRB (Yellow Rat Bastard) magazine logo and cover type
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140117164207im_/http:/typophile.com/files/yrb_5558.jpg)

Does anybody know which font they used for the title?  
Name of the pay-off font would be appreciated aswell :P
author: Chris82

comments.content:
By pay-off I presume you mean Futura top, Helvetica bottom.

Nick Cooke

What about the main title?  
That's the million $ question people.
The million $ question could very well be a custom designed logo for the magazine.
Maybe check Mike Yanega's [Lined Font Identification Guide](http://web.archive.org/web/20140117164207/http:/www.bowfinprintworks.com/LinedFontGuide01.html).
